title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a simple CLI and REST API; pull and run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama—chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python package.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package—use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive TUI for Ollama written in Go; browse, chat, and manage models.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline code copilots with autocomplete and chat.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama (Kotlin friendly) with sync/async APIs and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama: chat, generate, pull, and embed inside Ruby/Rails apps.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local LLM chat to any server using Ollama.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger CI module to spin up Ollama containers and run model tests in pipelines.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for private AI note assistance using Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset—use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-crewai
summary: CrewAI tool that wraps Ollama models so AI agents can chat locally without OpenAI.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: LogSeq plugin for offline AI assistance—summarize blocks, brainstorm, and Q&A.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake providing Ollama binaries, CUDA variants, and NixOS module.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate for Ollama with async/tokio support and strong typing.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library for Ollama with cross-compilation-friendly HTTP backend.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve deployment example for scaling Ollama models across GPU clusters.
